Review.Titre: I do not understand the point of having…
Review.Contenu: I do not understand the point of having an app when you can’t send a group text from the app.  I use this solely for group texting and can’t even send a group text on the app. I have to log in on my browser just to send a group text.  FIX THIS!!!

Review.Titre: Tried for several days and the account…
Review.Contenu: Tried for several days and the account keeps under review or blocked! Totally a waste of time.

Review.Titre: I’ve requested a call and a refund…
Review.Contenu: I’ve requested a call and a refund multiple times now with no reach back from your company. I’m going to report this transaction and work on getting my money back for lack of response or functionality of product.

Review.Titre: I would like to go on record to…
Review.Contenu: I would like to go on record to acknowledge this was truly one of the worst customer service I have had to experience. After not receiving the desired resolution I uploaded my complaint to a reputable review agency and was met with a response that not only did not refund the necessary amount owed but had the gall to reply in a rude manner . I am still awaiting the final resolution  . I have asked for the refund and look forward in hopes that they will honor their policy. At the very least the customers concerns must be addressed in a professional way. Pt.2 : I will add this since I have been asked by the company to clarify. My ask was for a refund but instead I was met with a list of what ( in their opinion) I the customer had done wrong. The back in forth did not address my reason for contact (refund) .  After what I thought was an attempt at aimiable resolution I was met with the following final email. The Tone in all of the chats and emails was rude, sarcastic unprofessional, and deflective. I will never use this company again nor will I recommend them to anyone else. "I'm very sorry that your experience was such that you found it necessary to contact the BBB to reach a resolution......Before we go any further, there are a couple of points in your email to the BBB that I would like to clarify...As far as the next steps, we should first have a discussion about your messaging practices.....I hope that you will retract your letter, as well as any similar comments you've made to other entities, with the understanding that we're willing to work with you to advise on best practices .....whether or not you spend another dime with us."Final Email:Hello V, If the only resolution you would find amicable is a refund for services we've rendered I'm afraid we can't do that.

HORRIBLE SERVICE.  SCAMMERS, CUSTOMER SERVICE IS VERY BAD, NEVER GET BACK TO YOU.. DOUBLE BILL YOUR CREDIT CARD FOR MORE THAN YOU ASK FOR , GOOD LUCK IN GETTING BACK YOUR MONEY.  HAD TO CONTACT AN ATTORNEY , BILLED ME OVER 700 ON MY CREDIT CARD. CROOKS.  DONT USE THEM

Have been a dedicated user to this site for three years.  I have 3 businesses set up with separate accounts. I tried to use other functions on the website than just simply texting.  I was given little to zero guidance on how to set up a poll and run it correctly when asking the customer support.   Then when I called in after spending money and not having my poll run correctly for help was given a "well sucks to be you attitude"   The texting feature works.  But I will be looking for another company to work with as I feel I can get the simple texting features else where with a higher degree of customer support.  I did not require my money back. Just simply some guidance to use the features that their sales people call me about monthly.

We used this service for our small non-profit in Austin, TX.  They claimed all sorts of things when I initially spoke with their salesman.  He set us up for a keyword and claimed it was free when in actuality their sales reps resold our keyword under the same number!!  We got all sorts of erroneous texts from outside areas without any understanding of why at that point.  We held an event where we printed a "text to donate" banner only to find out that it didn't work for any of the patrons that attended.  I spoke with their "tech support" said they couldn't verify why unless we had all of the potential new numbers that  the people used to text in.  Completely unhelpful.  I tried to get a refund and they claim their system cannot refund anything that was processed more than 24 hours ago, despite the fact that their service was a complete ripoff!  We are now almost a year into our campaign, have raised $0 and are actually out $225.  DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE!!!

Review.Titre: This company knows how to do marketing
Review.Contenu: This company knows how to do marketing, and they put all good reviews for themselves. In fact if you go further in google search you can see all of their bad reviews. The customer service is horrible. Their website is difficult to navigate and asking for help is useless. They will steal your list and none of you message can be sent out. I would give them a negative star if I can. They have not deserved even the 1 star. This is a really bad company

Review.Titre: This company is a real joke
Review.Contenu: This company is a real joke, I was out sick from work with cancer, as chemo is not enough and fighting for your life. So when I was returning to work I wanted to find a way to reach out to all my customers without group text. This company seemed to have promise but after I paid them 400$ I quickly realized it wasn’t going to work.nobody read the text considering the amount of fraud on our phones, my clients don’t reconize the number they used so they were not ever opened. You don’t use you business number. My clients mostly over the age of 60 they are just to cautious. When I tried calling I never got a return call only emails of how to fix the issue. I explained it would never be fixed because my clients would not open the text. I went and individually text my clients on my own it took a couple days but I had to use my number. Ez text claims you can cancel anytime that dosnt mean get you remaining money back. Nope they just keep it even thou they did nothing for you. Maybe if you are a huge retailer with a website you could get leads on it might be worth it then, but my one man business it would never be sítiale. So unless you have money to throw away, the amount of unprofessionalism and understanding of my situation is horrible. Don’t waste your money there are plenty of other companies to use

Yes, one star even tho I think the service is just fine. I'm a very small business and I only buy 1000 texts per month and what bothers me, more than anything, is the fact that my unused texts DO NOT rollover! They are my texts, I paid for them, they should remain there until I use them. Some months I will send more texts, other months, less. I feel RIPPED OFF!!!

Review.Titre: This whole company is a joke
Review.Contenu: This whole company is a joke. We are a dental office in the state of Utah and have been using them for 2+ years sending out the same message to our patients regarding billing. The state of Utah requires specific verbiage sent to patients 45 days prior to sending them to a collections agency. Again, we have been sending the exact same message for 2+ years and we recently received notice that they would be closing our account if we didn't stop the "threatening messages". I called customer service and I explained that it is a requirement of the state to include these supposedly "threatening" messages. They told me I would no longer be able to send these messages. So when I said we'd need to cancel our account then and asked to received a refund for our previous credit he said they don't issue refunds. So then I asked to speak to a supervisor and was placed on hold. Rep came back on and said again they can't issue a refund for the current credit, however if I purchase additional credits they can then refund those credits plus a small portion of my current credit. Why on earth would I have to purchase additional credits in order to receive a refund for credits I already purchased? There are other companies out there- don't waste your time with this one.

Review.Titre: It took them 12 hours to send an urgent…
Review.Contenu: It took them 12 hours to send an urgent message to my employees. In these times when communications concerning Covid-19 are critical and important they should rethink their message review process.

Review.Titre: They have never helped me set up my …
Review.Contenu: They have never helped me set up my adds and account after I paid them up front

Review.Titre: You Get What You Pay For
Review.Contenu: I've been using this service for at least 3 months, after switching from Simple Texting, and they still put my text through the review process as if it's an unverified account. Simple Texting had pricing issues, but their service was hassle free. I was trying to save money, but man ... you get what you pay for. It's always best to pay the price for quality.

Non-existent customer service.Constant need to enter 2F security codes - a headache when several employees share duties around the planet across many time zones.Pricing looks cheap but have a strange credit system to confuse you on pricing which ultimately ins't inexpensive.   GUI is not user friendly.ON the pro side-reliable sending of texts.

They need an app for android phone - only have app for iphone and its glitchy - Used browser to open account on my phone and it worked wellAccount verification is a pain in the a$$ - wish we could turn it off -

I was charged the two months following my cancellation of my subscription in which i had to call and get the money refunded. Then i was not told that even after i canceled my subscription plan that i would still be charged $25 a month for a keyword I haven't used in 6 months despite talking to your customer care people twice to get refunds for the canceled account. There is no app to accompany this service and your prices are no comparable to similar service such as simpletexting.com.

Review.Titre: This program is limited in what I can …
Review.Contenu: This program is limited in what I can say and the character length in the text, which makes it very hard to get my message out to our association. And the value is not there for the overall cost.
Works very well however pricing is high, what it does also small plans is a extremely expensive

Review.Titre: I never had the opportunity to use the…
Review.Contenu: I never had the opportunity to use the service even though I purchased a month.

Review.Titre: Should be able to delete numbers and…
Review.Contenu: Should be able to delete numbers and save all messages to a file.

Review.Titre: The features of the app are severely…
Review.Contenu: The features of the app are severely limited and in friendly.

Review.Titre: The cost per text is high!

Review.Contenu: This is great but it would certainly be helpful if I could establish an api from my hr payroll system is is too clunky to have to reload my list every time to handle new and termed employees

Review.Titre: Our agency has found this texting app…
Review.Contenu: Our agency has found this texting app very helpful and useful.

We're not able to send texts like we were when we first started using this text platform. With so many changes to carriers, it's been hard to send our texts without interruption or bouncebacks. It's been frustrating. But I appreciate the effort the customer service teams have put in to figure out the problems.

As of 2/14/20, EZ Texting didn't have a mobile app, but they offer a Send-From-Phone feature that allows users to send a text to their subscribers without logging in to their EZ Texting account. Sending text messages is excellent when accessed through a mobile or desktop browser. They offer SMS over 160 characters, detailed reporting, & personalized texts.It also has a built-in voice messaging feature.They don't offer multi-user login credentials.

Best pricing out there! Best solutions offered than what's out there! Two things I do wish those, that the website would have a better, more updated UI, and more importantly, if they could offer an iOS app that allows a business to create Automations, respond back to customers who text the Keyword with questions, see customer info, and a better way to integrate with Eventbrite instead of manually doing it. Right now, everything has to be done through there website, and it's not conducive to a business experience.

Works well.  I manage a small condominium and EZText is great for sending out periodic alerts like "Snow plow coming, move your cars" to the 12 residents.  I'm sure the features would be handy for a larger condominium or any operation, marketing, customer alerts, and the like.  Easy to use and very reliable.
I was having an issue and after an online chat with staff it was easily fixed; it was something I could have done myself but they offered to do it for me. So to me, that's above and beyond.
Gets the job done. The user interface could be vastly improved; it seems to have been designed by a software engineer rather than a UX designer.

Review.Titre: EZ Texting is reliable and we have been…
Review.Contenu: EZ Texting is reliable and we have been using this service for more than 6 months.  Customer service is good  too.

Review.Titre: Very clear and easy to use
Review.Contenu: Very clear and easy to use.  Makes it easy to reach our clients quickly and affordably.   We love EZ Text

Review.Contenu: EZ Texting is easy to use, but I wish it had draft modes.
EZ Texting was very useful and successful tool to collect Schar limud

Customer support since day one has ben exquisite, everyone has been so helpful. The only issues i have had at the beginning was my account being flagged twice but they told me why and what I can do to fix the issue.

Review.Titre: Ez Texting is the best platform ever
Review.Contenu: Ez Texting is the best platform ever. The onboarding was easy as pie and there customer service is the best. Did I mention how affordable they are? I will never use another texting platform so long as Ez-Texting is around

Review.Titre: Excellent service and features in the…
Review.Contenu: Excellent service and features in the solution.  We have used EZ Texting for many years and plan on for many more to come. Thanks from the team at seniorsplaces.com

Review.Titre: Our company has enjoyed this platform…
Review.Contenu: Our company has enjoyed this platform with the quick messaging features and easy functionality to send out mass communication to many people!

Review.Titre: EZ Texting is an excellent app
Review.Contenu: EZ Texting is an excellent app! We are a senior church and was looking for a way to send out group texts to our members to remind them of our services and special events etc.  This app was so easy to set up and use not to mention the excellent customer support I received to help me with questions and to explain how to use the app.  This app is also very affordable for our small community church! Our Church is so blessed to have this app. Sincerely, Maria

I have thoroughly enjoyed using EZ Texting.  It has made communication with groups easy and efficient. I love how you can include images in your messages as well.  I would love to be able to use more than one image at a time.  Also, I would love to be able to use this on my Android phone.

Review.Titre: My experience with Seamless Texting Campaigns with EZ TextingEZ Texting has been…
Review.Contenu: My experience with EZ Texting has been nothing short of excellent. What sets them apart is their seamless approach to texting campaigns, making it an absolute game-changer in the field.

Review.Titre: We are loving this resource for our…
Review.Contenu: We are loving this resource for our church and youth ministry! It makes communicating with a large group of people so easy! We highly recommend that you try them out!

As a busy school and church secretary, I am so grateful for how quick and "EZ" it is to get the word out to many families/friends using EZ Texting!  I have been using EZ Texting for a few years now.  I love it!

Review.Titre: We use EZ texting for our car show
Review.Contenu: We use EZ texting for our car show and it has been amazing! So efficient at sending out announcments to all of our patreons!

Review.Titre: Every time we use EZ Texting the ROI is…
Review.Contenu: Every time we use EZ Texting the ROI is immediate. The phone starts ringing with customers who say things like " We have been meaning to call you and receiving your text was just the reminder we needed." We will defiently be using this service again.
I have been able to send offers to my clients for a few years now by using EZ Texting. It's easy to use and it's a reliable service.

I own a service company that visits hundreds of homes each week.  Before eztexting, we emailed customers the day before visiting and still had several that would "forget" or just never knew we were coming because they didn't read their emails. If they forgot, they were skipped and then rescheduled. On some days as many as 20% were skipped. With eztexting, a skip is a rare occasion. And if they do forget, they can simply text us back allowing us to reschedule without having to waste time and money getting there. Skips are costly so this is well worth the cost. Couldn't be happier!

Review.Titre: EZ Texting is a great tool to reach…
Review.Contenu: EZ Texting is a great tool to reach employees that have limited access to email. Like our warehouse people and Truck drivers. Thank you for making such a great tool. We have 18 different locations, and we can segment and personalize the messages.

Review.Titre: effective way to share images to mobile device
Review.Contenu: easily can attach a jpeg file to show customers their proofs by way of a mobile device.  Organized contact list is simple to insert new names and information.  We receive much, much faster response from customers and prospects when engaging them on their mobile device.  EZ Texting is the best investment we have made in fast communication with customers working outside of an office.  Tripled our successful closing rate on prospective orders!

Working with EZ Text has helped transform our business. Our representative has been there every step of the way and continues to be there if/when we have questions. The system is very easy to use, connecting via API to your own system is extremely easy. I highly recommend using them for your client communication needs.

Sold a $1000 dollar product not necessary or useful to our small business start upI cannot Thank Rob the consultant for working with EZ texting enough.  As a small business owner with all of the difficulties of growing a business easy texting is not what we currently need but may be what we can use in the future on a more specific basis. I look forward at this point to using EZ texting in the future and I just can't thank them enough for my refund and for helping this small business to thrive!

We were wasting so much time calling customers to notify them when products got in. EZ Texting is a great way to communicate with both young and old in a direct and effective way. Plus, we don't have to manage opt-outs, we love it.

It's a great business asset to have the ability to drive traffic at a moment's notice.  EZ Texting brings incremental revenue to my store and I'm glad I have it as a tool in my marketing toolbox.  Easy to use, inexpensive and great service!

Review.Titre: This has been one of the easiest ways…
Review.Contenu: This has been one of the easiest ways to increase our outreach to our customer base! From the ability to set up our lists to sending out messages, it could not be easier!

EZ texting is a SMS/MMS service that is very easy to use, and very affordable. EZ Texting’s service team has promptly answered all questions, and has been invaluable in optimizing our company’s use of this service.

Review.Titre: EZ Texting Is Just That, EASY
Review.Contenu: EZ Texting Is Just That, EASY!  This has helped our communication with our employees.  The employees are happier and like this option so much more than checking their email.
I can reach out to all our public quite easily. Giving us the ability to receive and send texts using our landline number puts the cherry on top of it all. Really having so much fun with the app.

We have been using EZ Texting since January of this year.  We love it, our clients love it!  EZ Texting has saved us so much time on a daily basis.  Support staff is very helpful and they will walk you through setting up your business with their product. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Easy to use and has helped expand my…
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and has helped expand my business. Definitely a must have tool!

Review.Contenu: Such an easy app to use. I'm a Campus Pastor at a multi-site church Granite United Church (Salem, NH) and I use it for a variety of different communications.
Product is easy to use.  Billing, payment and texting all work great and I like the reports I can upload.
Easy to use platform and the addition of AI tool is a game changer!
Very easy to use. Customer service was excellent and was able to cater our client's needs. Highly recommend. Will definitely use again.

Great Service!  We can update customers instantaneously about weather conditions that will affect their service. EZ Texting is extremely effective in communicating with customers quickly and as frequently as needed.   Our customers appreciate the updates and the method in which it is delivered.
